about_the_game:
Impostor Online is a murder mystery and detective-style game inspired by social deduction games like Werewolf and Town of Salem. In each match, players are assigned random roles and must identify the Impostors before it's too late. The game is played between two teams: the Blue Team (the good guys) and the Red Team (the bad guys). The Blue Team wins by eliminating all Impostors, while the Red Team wins by either killing all the Ghost Investigators or all the civilians.

The Impostors are the main murderers. Each night, they can see and communicate with one another in a separate chat window (or through voice chat) and select one player to eliminate.

Ghost Investigators play a crucial role on the Blue Team. Each night, they can communicate and choose one player to investigate, revealing their role and guiding the team’s strategy.

During the day, players gather to debate who they believe is guilty. Through voting, they can lynch a suspect. Innocents must collaborate with Investigators to eliminate the Impostors and secure their victory.

In addition to Impostors and Investigators, there are also other special roles, such as the Butcher, Joker, Guardian... each with unique abilities.

FEATURES:

  • Multiplayer: play online, from 6 to 12 players. You can play with your friends or join other players.

  • Written and vocal chat: Communication is key in Impostor Online, as you have to either accuse suspicious players or defend yourself against their accusations!

  • Many playable characters: Special roles and abilities are available in Impostor Online. Such as Impostors, Ghost Investigators, Butcher, Guardian, Joker...

  • Customization: Personalize your character from head to foot.

  • Progression and statistics: Earn experience points and rewards from every game you win. As you level up, unlock new titles and cosmetic items to showcase your rank and style.

name: Impostor Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10/11 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 (2048 MB) or equivalent

short_description: Inspired by party games like Werewolf and Mafia, Impostor Online is a 6-12 player online game of murder and deception. Join friends and play as a civilian, impostor, butcher, joker, or unique characters to strategize your way to victory!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Thai, Traditional Chinese
